  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createObjects()
    Create the objects for the gamescreen and add them to the world.
    void createView()
    Create the view that shows the GameoBjects in the world and the set background.
    void endGame()
    Loads endscreen if all waves are done or fighter is out of lives.
    int getTime()
    Returns the value of the time attribute.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    void setGameState​(int state)
    Set the gamestate, '0' is startscreen, '1' is gamescreen, '3' is endscreen.
    void setupGame()
    Overrides GameEngine.setupGame(), sets the window size, initializes sound, creates the view and loads the startscreen, gamescreen or endscreen depending on the gamestate.
    void update()
    Overrides GameEngine.update(), increases the time attribute, spawns new Aliens if all are gone and there are more waves left to go, updates the dashboardtext, contains endGame().

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      Overrides GameEngine.setupGame(), sets the window size, initializes sound, creates the view and loads the startscreen, gamescreen or endscreen depending on the gamestate. If the gamescreen is loaded: sets time and score to 0, current wave to 1 and sets number of waves.
      Specified by:
      setupGame in class GameEngine

    • createObjects

      public void createObjects()
      Create the objects for the gamescreen and add them to the world.

    • createView

      public void createView()
      Create the view that shows the GameoBjects in the world and the set background.

    • update

      public void update()
      Overrides GameEngine.update(), increases the time attribute, spawns new Aliens if all are gone and there are more waves left to go, updates the dashboardtext, contains endGame().
      Specified by:
      update in class GameEngine

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Loads endscreen if all waves are done or fighter is out of lives.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState​(int state)
      Set the gamestate, '0' is startscreen, '1' is gamescreen, '3' is endscreen.

    • getTime

      public int getTime()
      Returns the value of the time attribute.
